snippet: Longtime NHL defenseman Ken Klee is out as the coach of the U.S. women's hockey team after leading the Americans to gold medals at the last two world championships....

headline.main: Poll Shows 71 Percent of French Want Fillon to Quit Presidency Race
headline.print_headline: Poll Shows 71 Percent of French Want Fillon to Quit Presidency Race

lead_paragraph: Longtime NHL defenseman Ken Klee is out as the coach of the U.S. women's hockey team after leading the Americans to gold medals at the last two world championships.
